attributes.action: let local councils have more  power to give priority to british born people  over housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are more than more homeless peole on our streets has there are no homes for them should it be right for british born people to have priority over housing has they were in this country first has assylum seekers seem to be given all the homes when they come to this country

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "let local councils have more power to give priority to british born people over housing."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17820


Prime Minister's Office
